content: "Here are some recommended scenic spots for each day of your 7-day trip to Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province in China in the winter season, along with brief descriptions of their features and attractions that might interest your group of friends: Day 1: 9:00 am - 12:00 am: West Lake (Xi Hu) - While the winter temperatures can be chilly in Hangzhou, West Lake is still a must-visit attraction year-round. In the winter, the scenery takes on a peaceful and serene quality with the misty lake and snow-covered landscape. Your friends can take a leisurely walk around the lake, enjoy a hot cup of tea at a lakeside teahouse, or take a boat ride to take in the winter wonderland scenery. 12:00 am - 1:30 pm: Lunch time 2:00 am - 5:00 am: Xixi National Wetland Park(your choice) - The winter months can be a quieter time to visit Xixi National Wetland Park, but the peaceful atmosphere makes for a unique experience. The park's serene waterways and marshes take on a tranquil quality, and visitors can enjoy the migratory birds that flock to the park during the winter months. Your friends can explore the park's various trails and enjoy the peaceful winter scenery. Note: Zijin Mountain is actually located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, which is a different city from Qingdao. If there are any errors in my recommendations, please let me know."
